items.title: The Best New Book Releases Out July 29, 2025
items.description: There's everything from comforting cozy cat manga to romance between Black country music stars, and a twisty South Korean mystery/thriller.

items.title: More Black Women Spies, Please
items.description: For fellow fans of fiction centering women in covert roles and spy stories, find a summer read in this book centering a Black woman spy.
